title: Grim Range Blaster
paragraphs: The Grim Range Blaster is a main weapon in Splatoon and Splatoon 2. It is a Sheldon's Picks-branded variant of the Range Blaster and comes with a different sub and special.

The Grim Range Blaster shares its overall design with the Range Blaster. However, the flames on the front are green, and the spray can attached to the back does not change color to match the user's ink.

The Grim Range Blaster is one of the nine weapons included in Sheldon's Picks Vol. 2 and was released on 8 June 2016.
As its name implies, is a variation of a regular Blaster with shots that travel farther before exploding. As a tradeoff, this blaster has a lower rate of fire. It comes with the Burst Bomb and Killer Wail.
